targets.query: SELECT last("usage_idle") *-1+100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "cpu" =~ /^$CPU$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Uso Actual de Espacio de Disco (%)

list.name: Host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "host"

list.name: CPU
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/

list.label: Disco
list.name: Disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/

list.label: Interfaz de Red
